inputs.name: _name
inputs.description: The name of the DesignDay object.

inputs.name: _day_type
inputs.description:
Text indicating the type of design day (ie. 'SummerDesignDay',
'WinterDesignDay' or other EnergyPlus days).

inputs.name: _location
inputs.description: A Ladybug Location object describing the location of the design day.

inputs.name: _date
inputs.description:
A Ladybug Date for the day of the year on which the design day occurs.
This should be in the format of 'DD Month' (eg. '1 Jan', '4 Jul').
The LB Calculate HOY component can also be used to construct this date.

inputs.name: _dry_bulb_max
inputs.description: Maximum dry bulb temperature over the design day (in C).

inputs.name: _dry_bulb_range_
inputs.description: Dry bulb range over the design day (in C).

inputs.name: _humidity_type
inputs.description: Type of humidity to use. (ie. Wetbulb, Dewpoint, HumidityRatio, Enthalpy)

inputs.name: _humidity_value
inputs.description: The value of the humidity condition above.

inputs.name: _wind_speed
inputs.description: Wind speed over the design day in m/s.

inputs.name: _wind_dir
inputs.description: Wind direction over the design day in degrees.

inputs.name: _sky_type
inputs.description: Type of solar model to use.  (eg. ASHRAEClearSky, ASHRAETau)

inputs.name: _sky_properties
inputs.description:
A list of properties describing the sky above.
For ASHRAEClearSky this is a single value for clearness.
For ASHRAETau, this is the tau_beam and tau_diffuse.

name: DF Construct Design Day
description:
Construct a design day from a set of parameters.
-
